title: 安装高版本forge崩溃
author: qwjjc
txt_content:
崩溃报告如下

[17:02:15] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 14.23.5.2838 for Minecraft 1.12.2 loading  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_131, running on Windows 7:amd64:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_131  [17:02:15] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch  java.lang.RuntimeException: An error occurred trying to configure the Minecraft home at D:\天蝎七号二代目\.minecraft for Forge Mod Loader     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupHome(FMLLaunchHandler.java:111) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupClient(FMLLaunchHandler.java:81) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.configureForClientLaunch(FMLLaunchHandler.java:42) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.injectIntoClassLoader(FMLTweaker.java:141) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:115) [launchwrapper-1.12.jar:?]     at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.12.jar:?] Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/maven/artifact/versioning/ArtifactVersion     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.libraries.LibraryManager.findLibraryFolder(LibraryManager.java:126) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.libraries.LibraryManager.setup(LibraryManager.java:77) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupHome(FMLLaunchHandler.java:106) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     ... 5 more Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.maven.artifact.versioning.ArtifactVersion     at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_131]     at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_131]     at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_131]     at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_131]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.libraries.LibraryManager.findLibraryFolder(LibraryManager.java:126) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.libraries.LibraryManager.setup(LibraryManager.java:77) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupHome(FMLLaunchHandler.java:106) ~[forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2838.jar:?]     ... 5 more Exception in thread "main" [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.ThreadGroup:uncaughtException:-1]: net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager$ExitTrappedException  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.ThreadGroup:uncaughtException:-1]:     at net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager.checkPermission(FMLSecurityManager.java:49)  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.ThreadGroup:uncaughtException:-1]:     at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkExit(Unknown Source)  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.ThreadGroup:uncaughtException:-1]:     at java.lang.Runtime.exit(Unknown Source)  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.ThreadGroup:uncaughtException:-1]:     at java.lang.System.exit(Unknown Source)  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.ThreadGroup:uncaughtException:-1]:     at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:138)  [17:02:15] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.ThreadGroup:uncaughtException:-1]:     at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)


如果没有解决办法麻烦帮我弄一个forge2.8版本以上的，谢谢了

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
https://pan.baidu.com/s/1sO8ecr375DbfaDNEWTf7kQ 提取码: nbkv

先试试下载这个文件，然后放到\.minecraft\libraries\org\apache\maven\maven-artifact\3.5.3目录下，没有文件夹就创建；有这个文件直接覆盖

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-23 19:17 编辑 

是安装forge时候库文件没下载全导致的，你可以用我的这个libraries替换掉你原来的再试一下
链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1recEyl7O0_WN8_lWD9-mew 
提取码：tokz 

然后用这个官方forge安装器安装forgehttps://files.minecraftforge.net ... 8-installer-win.exe

另外，启动器下载源选官方，在设置中勾选各版本 设置独立以及不使用本地路径，安装反复失败推荐用加速器
